property.label: Related List Name
property.name: relatedListName
property.description: The name of the related list as you would like it to appear on the record page.

property.label: Related List Icon
property.name: relatedListIcon
property.description: The path to the lightning design system icon that can be found in this library: https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/

property.label: Child Relationship Name
property.name: childRelationshipName
property.description: The child relationship name as found on the lookup field that creates the relationship between these objects. Be sure to include '__r' if this is a custom relationship.

property.label: Child Object Name
property.name: childObjectApiName
property.description: The API name of the object that the related list shows records for.

property.label: Parent Lookup Field Name
property.name: parentLookupField
property.description: The API name of the field on the child object that makes the relationship between the parent and the child.

property.label: Record Type
property.name: recordType
property.description: We expect record type label NOT record type developer name.

property.label: Column 1 Should Link to Record
property.name: column1LinkOverride
property.description: The text displayed in column 1 should link to a specific record

property.label: Column 1 Linked Record
property.name: column1LinkedRecord
property.description: A formaula field on the child object that stores the Id of the record to link to.

property.label: Column 1 Linked Record Object API Name
property.name: column1LinkedObject
property.description: The API name of the object for the record that is being linked.

property.label: Column 2 Should Link to Record
property.name: column2LinkOverride
property.description: The text displayed in column 1 should link to a specific record

property.label: Column 2 Linked Record
property.name: column2LinkedRecord
property.description: A formaula field on the child object that stores the Id of the record to link to.

property.label: Column 2 Linked Record Object API Name
property.name: column2LinkedObject
property.description: The API name of the object for the record that is being linked.
